item.description:
Results of last weeks Speed Dating:

2 couples connected and I could see them all having a great time.
This is a great tool for women to meet one another.

SPEED DATING: What better way to meet some interesting, lovely women.

Come and visit for 4 minutes with each female and see if you connect. At the end, we will provide you with the information ONLY if you are BOTH interested in each other. We will than provide you with each others information so that you can contact one another to meet again on your own.

First come, first serve. Seats fill up fast so get in line before 8:00 PM.

Dating is $10 (includes cover charge). This is a 21+ event.

$7.00 Cover charge

D.J. MURPH: Dancing right after speed dating to his Latin, R&B and Hip Hop music all night long.
item.name: Speed Dating and Dancing
